intro: [WRONG START] Colderia virens, commonly known as the greenflower coldenia, is a flowering plant native to the wet tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes many ornamental and economically important plants. The plant is characterized by its slender, upright stems and small, lance-shaped leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Its flowers are typically greenish-white with prominent yellow stamens, giving it a unique appearance. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories.
